Text:
Sadly it is true. This download consists of about one minute of footage from the trailer looped over and over for a length of about 100 minutes.

An old gag, but a "good" one.

Just go to the official site, people!
And yet... and yet - still 17 seeders and 98 leechers. Work that one out. Do people read the comments at all I wonder.
